additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Always read the label and follow the directions for use. Sunscreen is only one component of sun protection. Prolonged high-risk sun exposure should be avoided. Frequent use and re-application in accordance with directions is required for effective sun protection.

description: A non greasy, 3-in-1 moisturiser, high protection SPF colour correcting mineral sunscreen. The perfect product for those looking to incorporate SPF into their daily routine with a multi-tasking sunscreen.
name: Mineral CC Cream Light SPF50
